subject: quikscript.org
msgSnippet: Dear All: After around a year of dwelling on the concept, I now have quikscript.org working.  The primary goal is to have a threaded forum where everyone can
messageBody:
Dear All:

 

After around a year of dwelling on the concept, I now have quikscript.org working.  The primary goal is to have a threaded forum where everyone can use embedded fonts and read and write about QS by actually using it.  I have two fonts currently, the latest incarnation of King Plus Mono and Suave.

 

Through making surgical changes in forum style sheets and javascript (which I notice Mr. Sharfi has also done on his blog), I believe it is stable but requires an “up-to-date” browser.  I tested on my phone and it also renders well and is readable.

 

Testing is never complete so I’m open to suggestions for improvements, bug fixes, additions, etc.  Sadly, my skills in reading and writing software still surpasses my ability to read and write in quikscript, but I hope the forum will remedy this deficiency.

 

I hope others can give it a try and chat in quikscript.

 

Jayson
